alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Nelson; Pembina; Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 8:07AM CDT until June 14 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Marshall County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Kittson County in northwestern Minnesota... Roseau County in northwestern Minnesota... Grand Forks County in northeastern North Dakota... Northeastern Nelson County in northeastern North Dakota... Walsh County in northeastern North Dakota... Eastern Pembina County in northeastern North Dakota... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 806 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Glasston to near Donaldson to near Old Mill State Park, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Newfolden around 810 AM CDT. Lake Bronson, Halma and Strandquist around 815 AM CDT. Middle River around 820 AM CDT. Strathcona, Humboldt and Noyes around 825 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Greenbush and Caribou. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 127 and 217. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
